name: nw_endpoint_type_t
desc: The type of a network endpoint, such as a host or a service.

items.name: var nw_endpoint_type_address: nw_endpoint_type_t
items.desc: An endpoint represented as an IP address and port.

items.name: var nw_endpoint_type_host: nw_endpoint_type_t
items.desc: An endpoint represented as a hostname and port.

items.name: var nw_endpoint_type_bonjour_service: nw_endpoint_type_t
items.desc: An endpoint represented as a Bonjour service.

items.name: var nw_endpoint_type_url: nw_endpoint_type_t
items.desc: An endpoint represented as a URL, with host and port values inferred from the URL.
